root.name: Gran Turismo 6
root.description: OverviewAnnounced at a celebratory event for the 15th Anniversary of the series, Gran Turismo 6 is the second entry on the Playstaton 3. Multiple improvements to the engine were announced in the the physicis department derived from partnerships of suspension companies including KW Auto and Tire manufacturers Yokohama. The rendering system also saw large improvements. New FeaturesGran Turismo 6 is set to feature 1200 cars.33 locations and 71 layouts, with new tracks every month via DLCRefined Course MakerCommunity Race ClubsOnline Racing Series and ChampionshipsImproved Car Customization with over 1000 pieces of aero bodywork and new wheels.GT6 has connectivity with PC, smartphones and tabletsRefined menus focused on load times and ease of navigation
